title: Tom Hopkins - How to Master the Art of Selling Anything
description:
How to Master the Art of Selling Anything

Toms classic! Twelve compact discs teach you the complete sales process from prospecting and original contact through to closing and getting referrals. 

Twenty-four power-packed sessions explain:
- Ways to turn little dollars into big dollars 
- Where and how to meet new prospects
- Effective qualification strategies
- How to overcome customer objections 
- How to power close 
- How to turn rejection into success and much more 

Let master sales trainer Tom Hopkins lead you to the success you deserve today!

These were ripped from tape, I would love a rip from cd.
